string.name: newAccessToken
string.comment:
newAccessToken
API stands for application programming interface. In this context, it is an API that enables third-party software to work with Lichess. The API has an access token (sort of like a 'login') for security, which is for your account only.

resources.string: Neus persönlichs API Passwort
Es Passwort git andere Persone d\'Erlaubnis dis Konto z\'nutze.
Wähl sorgfältig us, was erlaubt isch, under dim Name z\'mache.
Passwort Beschribig
So erinnersch dich no, für was das Passwort isch
Was das Passwort, under dim Name, mache chann:
Das Passwort erlaubt en Zuegriff uf dis Konto. Gibs also NIE Anderne!
Kopier unbedingt jetzt dis neui Passwort oder schribs dir uf! Du gsehsch es nachher nümme!

string.name: preferenceRead
string.comment:
preferenceRead
In the context of an authentication token, a setting that enables permission to view preferences.

resources.string: Preferänze läse

string.name: preferenceWrite
string.comment:
preferenceWrite
In the context of an authentication token, a setting that enables permission to edit preferences.

resources.string: Preferänze schribe
d\'E-Mail-Adrässe läse
iträffendi Useforderige läse

string.name: challengeWrite
string.comment:
challengeWrite
In the context of an access token, a setting that enables permission to send, accept and reject challenges on behalf of the user

resources.string: iträffendi Useforderige schribe
Für anderi Schpiller viel Schpiel uf eimal erschtelle

string.name: studyRead
string.comment:
studyRead
Gives access to third-party software to *read* information that already exists. However it won't be able to write (create) private studies or broadcasts.

resources.string: Privati Schtudie und Sändige läse
Erschtell, aktualisier, lösch Schtudie und Sändige
Turnier erschtelle, aktualisiere und biträte
Puzzle Racer Ränne erschtelle und biträte

string.name: puzzleRead
string.comment:
puzzleRead
In the context of an access token, a setting that enables the permission to view the user's puzzle solving history

Teams, wo du fühersch betreue: persönlichi Nachrichte schicke, Mitglieder usschlüsse

Schpiel mit em API-Bot schpille
